cards.rules_text: When this creature enters, take to the streets. [i](Put the top card of your library on the battlefield face down with two defense counters. It's a battle protected by an opponent. When it's defeated, return it to its owner's hand.)[/i]

Lifelink
[i]Revolt[/i] — When this creature enters, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 red Rebel creature token.

When this creature enters, target creature gains indestructible and lifelink until end of turn. Create a white Tag token. [i](It's a white enchantment with “{1}, Sacrifce this token: Add {W}”)[/i]
{W}{W}{W}, Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Whenever this creature attacks, untap target creature you control. If you untap this creature this way, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

Whenever this creature attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.
{W}{W}{W}: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under your control. Activate only during your turn.

When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a non-battle permanent. If you do, take to the streets. [i](Put the top card of your library on the battlefield face down with two defense counters. It's a battle protected by an opponent. When it's defeated, return it to its owner's hand.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attacks a battle, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

This spell costs {2} less to cast if there's anarchy. [i](There's anarchy if you attacked with three or more creatures or defeated a battle this turn.)[/i]

Trample
Whenever you attack a battle, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that creature is attacking a battle, it gains trample until end of turn.

Whenever one or more enchantments you control enter, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. This ability triggers only once each turn.
